sentences.en: He'd spent four and a half years in windowless cells, much of the time in chains.
sentences.cn: 他在无窗的牢房里呆了4年半，大部分时间是手铐脚镣。

sentences.en: Finally, the apartment also had a windowless toilet.
sentences.cn: 公寓也有一间没有窗户的厕所。

sentences.en: On the upper floor, skylights brighten a windowless hallway that leads to the bedrooms.
sentences.cn: 楼上，天窗的光照亮了通向卧室的无窗走廊。
